plot: Marge bonds with Bart when she discovers a secret from her past, terrifying Homer.

Bart learns that his mother has had a rebellious streak during her teen years. Marge and Bart start to prank people who have wronged them, the two begin pranking Comic Book Guy for his rude behavior by ruining his collectibles, Marge and Bart get revenge on Helen Lovejoy by putting in embarrassing items in her cart at the market, and they get back at Mr. Burns for his spiteful attitude at the Sprawl Mart. Marge soon realizes she has taken her pranking too far after she sees Mr. Burns getting injured. Marge decides to teach Bart a lesson about the consequences of pranking. Meanwhile, Homer takes an interest in Lisa's vegan life-style.—dawsonpersi
